ContactUsPage.title: Contact Mythoria
ContactUsPage.intro: Greetings, fellow adventurer! Whether you're from the Shire, Hogwarts, or a galaxy far, far away, we're here to assist you in your journey through the wonderful world of Mythoria. Your feedback is as precious as the One Ring (but easier to handle, we promise!).
ContactUsPage.scrollTitle: Send Us Your Owl (or just fill the form)
ContactUsPage.scrollIntro: Choose the scroll that best suits your quest:

categories.reportBug: Report a Bug (Even Sherlock Holmes needed clues!)
categories.troubles: Story Generation Troubles (When the magic spells go awry)
categories.delivery: Printed Book Delivery (Our owls might need directions)
categories.credits: Credits & Payments (The goblins at Gringotts are strict!)

form.title: The Magic Form
form.name: Your Name:
form.emailPlaceholder: So our carrier pigeons can find you
form.messagePlaceholder: Share your thoughts, ideas, or magical feedback...

join.title: Join the Fellowship
join.intro: Mythoria is on an epic quest to conquer new realms and we are looking for brave souls to join our fellowship!
join.printing: Printing & Logistics Partners: Are you ready to journey across Middle-earth or Westeros to deliver stories that matter? Join us in spreading the magic of personalized storytelling.
join.country: Country Managers & Local Wizards: Help Mythoria take over the world (peacefully, we assure you). Bring the joy of storytelling to your kingdom and beyond!
join.developers: Developers Who Vibe Code & Speak AI: Do you speak fluent binary and chat effortlessly with AI? We need skilled developers who vibe with innovative technology and artificial intelligence to enhance the Mythoria experience.
join.call: Interested in becoming a Mythorian? Send us your details using the enchanted form above, and let us know your area of interest.

bonus.title: Bonus Credits Alert!
bonus.content: Have a sharp eye for bugs or an imaginative mind bursting with ideas? Earn extra magical credits for every valid bug reported or inspired feature suggested.
bonus.disclaimer: (*) Final decision rests with our delightful Oompa Loompas. They're charmingly unpredictable, but they love rewarding creativity!
